data.name: About
data.value: هذا البوت يتيح لك استخدام SauceNAO's للبحث العكسي عن الصور. أرسل إلي صورة(صورة،GIF,ستيكرز) و سأقوم بلبحث عنها باستخدام SauceNAO API. هذا البوت تم تصنيعه من فئة ثالثة خارجية لاستخدام SauceNAO على التيليغرام. هذا المشروع لا ينتمي بأي شكل مع Xamayon (المصنع الأساسي الى SauceNAO).

data.name: Anticheats
data.value: استخدم هذه الخاصية لحجب البحث العكسي عن الصور المرسلة من بوت محدد في مجموعة الحديث الخاصة بك. لإضافة بوت إلى قائمة ال AntiCheat قم بلرد على الرسالة المرسلة من قبل البوت بهذا النص /anticheats add. لإزالة البوت، قم بلرد على الرسالة بهذا النص /anticheats remove .

data.name: AnticheatsAdded
data.value: تم إضافة البوت @{0} إلى قائمة AntiCheats.

data.name: AnticheatsAlreadyExists
data.value: البوت @{0} موجود مسبقاً بقائمة AntiCheats.

data.name: AnticheatsDeleted
data.value: تم إزالة البوت @{0} من قائمة AntiCheats.

data.name: AnticheatsDoesNotExist
data.value: البوت @{0} غير موجود بقائمة AntiCheats.

data.name: AnticheatsMessage
data.value: لا تغش يا صديقي (; .

data.name: AntiCheatsNotABot
data.value: هذا المستخدم ليس بوت.

data.name: ApiKey
data.value: If you're already supporting Xamayon (the original creator of saucenao.com), then you can configure the bot to use your own API key to get your sauces instead of using shared API keys. /apikey status - Check the status of your saved api key. /apikey set <your api key> - Save your API Plus key. Don't use free API keys or it will cause problems for you. /apikey delete - Delete your saved api key.

data.name: ApiKeyDeleted
data.value: The saved api key has been deleted.

data.name: ApiKeyNew
data.value: Done! The Bot will use your API key from now on. To delete it, use /apikey delete.

data.name: ApiKeyNone
data.value: There is no api key configured.

data.name: ApiKeyStatus
data.value: Bot is configured to use the follow api key: {0}

data.name: Busy
data.value: SauceNao is very busy right now. Please try again later or try using /temp command. If this message appears frequently, please check the support chat.

data.name: BuyMeACookie
data.value: Your contributions are used to pay for the bot's hosting and the shared account that we use to search for your sauces. If you have any other questions, ask in the support chat. - Buy me a cookie! - Bitcoin: bc1q0w43tprjn80zn248k7xlztu7lvhkzgy6dak8mt - Toncoin: EQC3SWZxs_4ive2aD-njns1KnB4S2RUgaxDKJ7X44VA52SsY Note: Please be sure to confirm the amount you will donate. We don't make refunds.

data.name: Creator
data.value: My creator is Derek Nieves.

data.name: EmptyRequest
data.value: You need to reply to an image file (image, GIF or a sticker)

data.name: FailedConvertFile
data.value: Failed to convert file to a supported file.

data.name: GeneratingTmpUrl
data.value: Generating temporary link...

data.name: PrivateChatsOnly
data.value: This command only works in private chats.

data.name: GroupsOnly
data.value: This command only works in group chats.

data.name: Help
data.value: Send me an image file (image, GIF or a sticker) to find it's sauce right now. (source) If I'm in a group, reply to an image with /sauce . Forward the media files you have searched along with their sauce via bot. More Info: /help MyHistory. Use my Anti-Cheat feature in your groups when playing "Guess the Character". More Info: /help AntiCheats

data.name: History
data.value: You can send images with sauce from your recent history via bot. The history will be erased periodically. If you want to delete your history right now, type /history clear.

data.name: HistoryButton
data.value: View search history

data.name: HistoryNone
data.value: This seems somewhat empty. Try to find some sauces.

data.name: HistoryErased
data.value: Your history has been erased. Inline search results can take a few minutes to disappear because they are cached.

data.name: InvalidPhoto
data.value: That doesn't look like a photo file.

data.name: MissingParams
data.value: You have not specified sufficient parameters to use this function.

data.name: NotFound
data.value: No sauce found. Maybe try Google Reverse Search or Yandex instead? or see on SauceNAO website to see all the results.

data.name: SetLang
data.value: Use this command to change the reply language in the current chat. Not all languages are available. Syntax: /setlang [-Force] Specify the optional [-Force] parameter to keep your language in any group regardless of the group's language.

data.name: SetLangSaved
data.value: Your language preferences have been saved.

data.value: Source
